answers.answer: Have you spoken with your grandchild's pediatrician? That would be the very first person to call/contact for medical advice.

this is an adult forum for diabetes as well.  If you are concerned about diabetes I would check out this one:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Diabetes---Juvenile-Type-I/show/220and definitely check with his doctor if you have concerns.
